songs.lyrics:
[Eazy-E]
But anyway, fuck all the shit you know
You know cause huh, most people in Compton don't give a fuck. Young niggas gangbangers, same fucking thing with the police. All we do is rap about it. You know, you know, you know, you know cause police is like fucking with people, you know. Niggas stop you, throw you on the ground and shit. You know, put a gun to your head and shit. You know what I'm saying?
You know just fuck with you for no reason. Anyway, huh fuck the police
songs.title: Fuck Tha Police (Insert)
